spec_data.Name: php-pear-Net-Sieve
spec_data.Description:
This package provides an API to talk to servers implementing the
managesieve protocol. It can be used to install and remove sieve
scripts, mark them active etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:31:57 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Handles talking to a sieve server
